view.name: zks_information_schema_fkconstraints
view.def:
SELECT (current_database())::information_schema.sql_identifier AS trigger_catalog, (n.nspname)::information_schema.sql_identifier AS trigger_schema, (t.tgname)::information_schema.sql_identifier AS trigger_name, (t.tgconstrname) AS constraint_name, (t.tgenabled != 'D') AS trigger_enabled, -- thx 8.3 (current_database())::information_schema.sql_identifier AS event_object_catalog, (n.nspname)::information_schema.sql_identifier AS event_object_schema, (c.relname)::information_schema.sql_identifier AS event_object_table
FROM pg_namespace n, pg_class c, pg_trigger t
WHERE (n.oid = c.relnamespace) AND (c.oid = t.tgrelid) AND ( t.tgisconstraint) AND ( pg_has_role(c.relowner, 'USAGE'::text) OR has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'INSERT'::text) OR has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'UPDATE'::text) OR has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'DELETE'::text) OR has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'REFERENCES'::text) OR has_table_privilege(c.oid, 'TRIGGER'::text) )
